original_text: Do everything that you can to live in peace with other people. Make yourself separate from bad things. Nobody will see the Lord unless their life is good and clean. Do everything that you can to live in peace with other people. Make yourself separate from bad things. Nobody will see the Lord unless their life is good and clean.
korean_text: 모든 사람과 더불어 화평함과 거룩함을 따르라 이것이 없이는 아무도 주를 보지 못하리라

sentences.korean_translation: 네가 할 수 있는 모든 것을 하라

sentences.original_text: to live in peace with other people
Make yourself separate from bad things
unless their life is good and clean
